lead_paragraph: Daniel M. Donovan Jr., the Republican candidate for attorney general, spoke to students from LaGuardia Community College on a campaign stop at the Long Island Rail Road station in Bayside, Queens.
snippet: N.Y. See: Daniel M. Donovan on the campaign trail at a train station in Queens.
abstract: N.Y. See: Daniel M. Donovan on the campaign trail at a train station in Queens.
